website_summaries.verdict: The Dell 28 Ultra HD Monitor P2815Q is a well-equipped 28-inch Ultra-High-Definition (UHD) monitor with a sub-$600 price. It delivers a highly detailed 4K image, but it can't do it at 60Hz.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor, looks great with PC and MacBoo, but a few gripes: - USB-C to DP connection for the Mac means the USB hub in the monitor won't work (it is fine for PC with the second cable) - No VESA mount which I didn't realise; not a game-changer but annoying to be missing on a monitor of this price - Switching between inputs is a bit of a pain given you have to go into the menu and click a few times Nothing dramatic, and of course I could have sprung for a proper USB-C/Thunderbolt enabled monitor, but worth bearing in mind. Still, overall, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Winton

customer_reviews.title: Value 4k in a lovely package
customer_reviews.text: 1 Surprised by the hi qual. 4k display, 2 large number of inputs and supplied cables 3 Ease of control - typically Dell 4 Excellet price for quality of item. 5 1yr warranty not 3! Check ne 6 Stand not height adjustable but stable with good tilt - acceptable for a taller user 7 Speakers acceptable but not loud. 8 Solidly made with understated appearence Reading reviews the monitor is well liked but other more expensive types are suggested. For home office use save yourself 200.
customer_reviews.author: Mao

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor. Not sure if worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like that there was no power supply with a UK plug on it. Thankfully i was able to use the power cord from my old monitor. Bit confusing with regards to the number of USB ports it has. The product specification says 2 but in the description it mentions 3. There are actually 2 downstream USB ports and one upstream port. Otherwise, picture quality is good and has decent number of inputs for display.
customer_reviews.author: TiredDad

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, I use it for photography and for general computing. Excellent picture quality for my needs (I use high end gear). Very accurate colour reproduction, the curve is very nice and immersive.
customer_reviews.author: MCC

customer_reviews.title: I love the USB upstream feature
customer_reviews.text: Its not 4K but its a beautiful monitor. I bought it for the USB upstream feature which allows me to connect my speakers, mouse and keyboard to the monitor which can then act as a KVM switch. I connect my PC and Apple Mac-mini to it and when I switch input the keyboard, mouse and speakers switch to the computer that the monitor is displaying. Its wonderful and saves having 2 of everything on your desk. Also has enough space to view 2 apps side by side and still feel full-screen.
customer_reviews.author: Imran Qureshi

customer_reviews.title: Has to be the best on the market.
customer_reviews.text: An astounding monitor. The usual Dell build quality., The subtle curvature of the screen is not a gimmick, it really adds to the enjoyment of the display. Picture quality is superb, and adjustments are easy. Contains a very useful 4-port USB 3.0 hub, and speakers, although I use an external sound system. so I can't comment on them. If you want to watch modern films on it, the 21:9 picture ratio is perfect for it. Connectivity is second-to-none. If you're in the market for a monitor of this class, and can afford it, buy it!
customer_reviews.author: B. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Terrible for photography otherwise great.
customer_reviews.text: Look, this is a fine monitor for everyday use, but terrible for photography. Contrast, colours, brightness, shades are not great. This is the first monitor I have bought & I wish I had spent more money. Otherwise easy to set up and connect, loads of cabers supplied.
customer_reviews.author: UJG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful monitor
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picture and an amazing productivity boost with the ultra-wide format. My product had one blown (dark) pixel, but given how small the pixels are, it's not too distracting. One tip - the USB ports under the monitor were a bit problematic, until I plugged the monitor into one of the USB 3.0 ports (previously it was on the USB 2.0). Then all was fine. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Hardman

customer_reviews.title: Was easy to sit up and came with all the necessary ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my macbook air early 2014 in clam shell mode. Was easy to sit up and came with all the necessary cables. I was afraid that it was going to be one long battle but is quite intuitive to set up. One gripe I have is that the controls and menu on the screen is a bit fiddly, although i have this problem with all desktop screens. Good screen otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: a2reno

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Screen quality is great. Excellent to connect via USB-C/HDMI to my XPS13. Con: More difficult than other models to get to HDMI ports.
customer_reviews.author: cccc

customer_reviews.title: Everything I hoped it would be. Used it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything I hoped it would be. Used it to replace two monitor set ups I'd been using for twenty years.
customer_reviews.author: T. King

customer_reviews.title: Nice display.  Annoying controls
customer_reviews.text: Just plugs in and works. Can't fault the display. Controls are a bit annoying because they're menu-based meaning you can't easily switch between 2 sources.
customer_reviews.author: rs

customer_reviews.title: Dell is good quality as always - use with Amazon firestick
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a high def monitor. Bought for the integrated speakers. Attached Amazon prime firestick which works perfectly except remote control, however set volume to mac and works fine.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: it's amazing how much more screen real estate this can offer
customer_reviews.text: The curve is so subtle I'm not convinced it really adds to the experience as is claimed by the manufacturer. But upgrading from a previously Dell 2007WFP (1900x1200), it's amazing how much more screen real estate this can offer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What can i say apart from you get what you pay for. Crystal clear picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed !
customer_reviews.text: Incredible monitor, pin sharp, no backlight bleed, easily adjustable, curved screen, great for gaming, easy touch screen menus, the best monitor I've ever seen, worth far more and with the Dell promise too!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Big Screen with lots of pixel at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the monitor. I use it on a 2014 Mac Mini and it runs at 3840 x 2160 resolution. I bought it replace my 6 year old 1920x1200 monitor. I feels like have 4 of my old monitors on a single screen.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Mills

customer_reviews.title: Thanks DELL
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Great stand,picture, build quality. Built in speakers are decent too.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply awesome. I know
customer_reviews.text: Simply awesome. I know, I would want the review to be more detailed and probably some video or pictures, but honestly, there is noting more to say... It is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Andrius

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Amazing screen. For anyone in the same boat as me with a Mid 2012 Retina MacBook Pro (with discrete graphics), it works fine with the mini-dp to display port cable at the native resolution, even though Apple says it won't.
customer_reviews.author: Ben G

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic monitor. I didn't have any of the issues other reviewers have encountered. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: DR T. S. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Happy with this purchase - makes working in things like Excel great with so much space !
customer_reviews.author: Retrospek

customer_reviews.title: Reccomended
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews - thanks to the 5 who took the time and trouble to previously do so. This monitor is simply breathtaking! Sharp text and great colour accuracy. Buy.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor. Brilliant resolution and picture quality, easy to setup and control panel I found very intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: melbgeo

customer_reviews.title: Just ideal for what I needed. A PC and ...
customer_reviews.text: Just ideal for what I needed. A PC and a Mac on the screen at the same time, or multiple windows in view with decent size.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Andrew Evans

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Don't hesitate, just get it. It's one of the best purchases I've made for my build.
customer_reviews.author: fras78

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: NB: there is some light bleed but it's not too noticable.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Wow..Purchased one from Germany as i could not get one in this country even though i have had it in order for six weeks.Worth the wait and far better than my old LG34um95 and my present Dell u3014.Stunning screen and a fantastic allrounder.Watching movies is a treat except that i'm going to have to watch them all again.Great for my photographic work and i can have four a4 documents open at the same time for the dreaded paperwork...plus it looks so good!
customer_reviews.author: Vans the Man

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this screen! I use it mostly for programming and game dev, it fits my needs perfectly. The only down side is pretty much what everyone have already been saying about ultra wide screens - the resolution isn't that common so YouTube, movies and some games just play in the middle with black bars on the sides. Feels like a waste, but doesn't really bother me. I strongly recommend it for work.
customer_reviews.author: Iggy

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice.
customer_reviews.text: As always, Amazon's delivery is faultless. The Dell monitor is well packaged and very easy to set up. It is connected to a Surface Pro 4 / i5 / 4GB /128GB via the Mini-DisplayPort to DisplayPort at 4K resolution. Cannot fault the picture quality. Using the MS Wireless Display adaptor only give 1080p resolution. Using the MDP does not utilise the Dell's speakers - sound still comes from the SP4. Nice, quality feel of the monitor. Buying a 4K monitor to use with the SP4 totally enhances the experience in a very positive way.
customer_reviews.author: Ratboyslim32

customer_reviews.title: Lovely screen, but 2560x1440 is a better resolution for gamers
customer_reviews.text: Coming from a triple 1080p setup I found this screen a real joy, no more bezels. Colours are good, but there is a little bleed on the edges into the blacks. Dell's software is easy to setup for auto resizing of windows (if you want it). Can't say I really notice the curve, seems a bit of a gimmick to me. Biggest issue is that many games do not like this resolution. For photographers its amazing, buy it and be happy. For gamers, stick to a 2560x1440 monitor instead.
customer_reviews.author: C Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great looking monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great looking monitor, but the set up needs to be changed from the factory setting if you want to use it as a single monitor or you get error messages, would have preferred it with a silver trim like my 24" one.
customer_reviews.author: W. W. Dug

customer_reviews.title: Very happy user
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this screen. Great for viewing documents side by side. For me, the HD (1080p) resolution is just right for Windows-type products. 4K can reportedly cause issues with font sizes etc.
customer_reviews.author: MikeC

customer_reviews.title: Great screen
customer_reviews.text: What a lovely screen! I've been contemplating which one of the 34" I should get, and after countless reviews and research I landed in this one. The only small drawback is a bit of back bleed in the corners, but I've seen it way worse than this!
customer_reviews.author: Kyrre Gjerstad

customer_reviews.title: Far from perfect gaming monitor
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - great colours - good contrast - flicker free - anti-glare coated - solid stand - useful curve display shape - useful 21:9 aspect ratio Cons: - not impressing response time (8ms in normal mode) - noticable side effects (overshooting) in response time fast mode (5ms) - not impressing input lag (19ms) - possibly IPS glowing - uniformity compensation inflexible in options "Should I buy it for gaming?" 8ms response time + 19ms input lag is still ok for most kind of gaming (even FPS) today but some of ultra-hardcore FPS gamers may feel uncomfortable with that overall latency.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Km Flak

customer_reviews.title: Very bad quality panel
customer_reviews.text: Dell says premium panel but I disagree original monitor received defective behind screen few black dots later received replacement as well defective hair line behind screen amazon created return and want I send it back my own costs very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: TadasUK

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly to watch ultra wide (2.4:1) blue-ray movies using the full screen. None of the expensive Blu-ray software players, including the installed Cyberlink Power DVD 12 will play the ultrawide 2.4:1 movies such as Lord of the Rings at full screen but Media Player Classic will (fortunately).
customer_reviews.author: Just Hugh

product_meta.title: Dell S2817Q 27.9" 4K Ultra HD LED Matt Flat Black Computer Monitor
feature_bullets: This refurbished product is tested and certified to look and work like new. The refurbishing process includes functionality testing, basic cleaning, inspection, and repackaging. The product ships with all relevant accessories, and may arrive in a generic box

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars14 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
